channel.title: Civil War?
channel.description:
Hello, I'm just your common member of Moparisthebest.com. Not many people know who I am. I am here today to ask the public -- ask them a simple question. Should we fight the corrupt administration? I mean, the only way this is possible is through civil war.
What does everyone say?

item.title: Civil War?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

There is no currupt Administration. Mopar has done nothing but help you all. Starblaster is the finest of all the admins. Algas, well I havent spoken to him much. It is the Global Moderators who are corrupt. Administrators are fine. The global moderators are not.

BobDole is one of them who isn’t corrupt. I’m afraid to say I havent seen Miss Silabsoft help anyone lately and kmb has done nothing but post pictures of Nazis up. We don’t need to fight anyone. We need to talk to the adminitrators about this problem of the Global Moderators.

Read full topic
